perturbation.original_text: 4.3 Party B shall first pay a deposit of RMB100,000 to Party A within 5 working days after the signing of this Agreement. For list more products, Party B shall apply to Party A 3 working days in advance and after obtaining the consent of Party A, pay the deposit in full within 5 working days from the date of receipt of the deposit notice from Party A.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.3 Party B shall first pay a deposit of RMB100,000 to Party A within 15 working days after the signing of this Agreement. For list more products, Party B shall apply to Party A 3 working days in advance and after obtaining the consent of Party A, pay the deposit in full within 3 working days from the date of receipt of the deposit notice from Party A.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces an inconsistency regarding the payment deadline for the initial deposit. Originally, it was 5 working days. Now it becomes 15 working days. For additional deposits, it originally said 5 working days from the date of the deposit notice, but now it says 3 working days. This creates confusion and uncertainty as to when the deposit is actually due.

perturbation.original_text: 4.5 If Party B shall increase the deposit in accordance with this Agreement, it shall pay the additional deposit in full within 5 working days from the date of receipt of Party A's deposit payment notice. If Party B's deposit is deducted in whole or in part due to Party B's breach of this Agreement or other reasons, Party B shall replenish the deposit within 5 working days from the deduction date of the deposit as well as pay the additional deposit in full in accordance with Article 4.4.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.5 If Party B shall increase the deposit in accordance with this Agreement, it shall pay the additional deposit in full within 10 working days from the date of receipt of Party A's deposit payment notice. If Party B's deposit is deducted in whole or in part due to Party B's breach of this Agreement or other reasons, Party B shall replenish the deposit within 2 working days from the deduction date of the deposit as well as pay the additional deposit in full in accordance with Article 4.4.
perturbation.explanation: Here, a contradiction is introduced regarding the time frame for replenishing and increasing the deposit. Now it says the increase should be within 10 working days. However, it is 2 working days to replenish funds. This creates ambiguity and potential disputes.

perturbation.original_text: 4.7 After Party B terminates or rescinds this Agreement, if there is no effective Vehicle Lease Agreement between Party B and a Driver User (if the operational leasing business is conducted) and there is no dispute on the vehicle lease between Party B and a Driver User, Party A shall refund the remaining deposit to Party B on a interest-free basis within 30 days after receipt of the deposit receipt returned by Party B; if there is any effective Vehicle Lease Agreement between Party B and a Driver User or if there is any disputes on the vehicle lease between Party B and a Driver User, Party A shall refund the remaining deposit to Party B on a interest-free basis within 30 days after receipt of the deposit receipt returned by Party B after the driver confirms the Vehicle Lease Agreement has been fulfilled or the dispute has been resolved.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.7 After Party B terminates or rescinds this Agreement, if there is no effective Vehicle Lease Agreement between Party B and a Driver User (if the operational leasing business is conducted) and there is no dispute on the vehicle lease between Party B and a Driver User, Party A shall refund the remaining deposit to Party B on a interest-bearing basis within 60 days after receipt of the deposit receipt returned by Party B; if there is any effective Vehicle Lease Agreement between Party B and a Driver User or if there is any disputes on the vehicle lease between Party B and a Driver User, Party A shall refund the remaining deposit to Party B on a interest-free basis within 15 days after receipt of the deposit receipt returned by Party B after the driver confirms the Vehicle Lease Agreement has been fulfilled or the dispute has been resolved.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states a 30-day refund timeframe for the deposit in either scenario. Now it says 60 days with interest for one and 15 days without for the other. This is a direct contradiction in terms, leading to uncertainty.
